abstract: Police Service of Northern Ireland announces that former British soldier who was arrested for involvement in 1972 Bloody Sunday massacre has been released on bail.
lead_paragraph: The former soldier, 66, who was arrested in connection with the 1972 Bloody Sunday massacre has not been charged.

headline.main: Northern Ireland: Ex-Soldier Is Released on Bail in Bloody Sunday Investigation
headline.print_headline: Europe; Northern Ireland: Ex-Soldier Is Released on Bail in Bloody Sunday Investigation

snippet: The former soldier, 66, who was arrested in connection with the 1972 Bloody Sunday massacre has not been charged.
